document.full_text: the controversial florida pastor who was banned by a detroit court from protesting in front of a mosque will file an appeal to that decision on tuesday, a member of his florida church said on monday.
document.title: florida pastor to appeal mosque protest ban
lines_and_colors: the controversial florida pastor who was banned by a detroit court from protesting in front of a mosque will file an appeal to that decision on tuesday, a member of his florida church said on monday.
